on-connected.description: Triggered when connected to the signalling.

on-joined-room.description: Triggered when successfully joined a room.

on-peer-message.description: Triggered when a message is received.

on-any-peer-message.description: Triggered when any message is received from a peer, regardless of the tag.

is-host.description: Returns true if the client tag is host.

on-peer-connected.description: Triggered on peer connected to host.

on-disconnected.description: Triggered on disconnected from signalling server

on-peer-disconnected.description: Triggered when peer disconnect (either from host or a peer leaving the host).

is-connected.description: True if connected to a signalling server

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

is-in-room.description: Returns true if the client tag is in a room.

on-error.description: Triggered if an error occurs with the signalling server. The ErrorMessage expression indicates the type of error that occurred.

on-room-list.description: Triggered when the room list is received from the signalling server. The RoomList expression contains the list of rooms.

connect.display-text: Connect to signalling server at [i]{0}[/i] clientTag [i]{1}[/i]

url.name: URL
url.desc: The URL of the signalling server to connect to.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: Client Tag. Create if not found.

join-room.display-text: Join room [i]{2}[/i] Game [i]{0}[/i] Instance [i]{1}[/i] max-peers [i]{4}[/i] clientTag [i]{3}[/i]
join-room.description: Join a room on the signalling server.

game.name: Game
game.desc: The name of the game to join.

instance.name: Instance
instance.desc: The name of the instance to join.

room.name: Room
room.desc: The name of the room to join.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

max-peers.name: Max Peers
max-peers.desc: The maximum number of peers allowed in the room. Leave 0 to ignore.

send-message.display-text: Send message [i]{3}[/i] to peer [i]{0}[/i] tag [i]{1}[/i] clientTag [i]{2}[/i] mode [i]{4}[/i]
send-message.description: Send a message to a peer in the room.

peer-id.name: Peer ID
peer-id.desc: The ID of the peer to send the message to.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

broadcast-message.display-text: Broadcast tag [i]{1}[/i] message [i]{3}[/i] (from [i]{0}[/i], Client Tag [i]{2}[/i], mode [i]{4}[/i])
broadcast-message.description: Send a message to a peer in the room.

from-id.name: From ID
from-id.desc: The ID of the peer origin. blank to indicate from host.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

disconnect-signalling.display-text: Disconnect from signalling server Client Tag [i]{0}[/i]

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

kick-peer.description: Leave room on signalling server (room connection remain)

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

request-room-list.display-text: Request room list from signalling server Client Tag [i]{0}[/i] game [i]{1}[/i] instance [i]{2}[/i] which [i]{3}[/i]
request-room-list.description: Request the room list from the signalling server.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. Ignored if not found.

game.name: Game
game.desc: The name of the game to filter rooms by.

instance.name: Instance
instance.desc: The name of the instance to filter rooms by.

Message.description: Returns the message of the revelant trigger.

Tag.description: Returns the message tag of the revelant trigger.

PeerID.description: Returns the peer ID of the revelant trigger.

MyID.description: Returns the ID of the client tag.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: Client Tag. return emtpy string if not found.

HostID.description: Returns the host ID of the client tag.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: Client Tag. return emtpy string if not found.

PeerAlias.description: Returns the peer alias of the revelant trigger

ErrorMessage.description: In On signalling error, the error message if available.

CurrentRoom.description: Returns the Room name of the client tag.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. return emtpy string if not found.

ListRoomCount.description: After On Room List, the number of rooms in the received list.

ListRoomName.description: Returns the name of the room at the specified index in the received list.

index.name: Index
index.desc: The index of the room in the list.

PeerCount.description: Returns the number of peers connected in the current room.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: The client tag to identify the room.

FromAlias.description: Returns the alias of the peer that sent the message in the revelant trigger

FromID.description: Returns the ID of the peer that sent the message in the revelant trigger

MyAlias.description: Returns the alias of the client tag.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. return emtpy string if not found.

HostAlias.description: Returns the alias of the host client tag.

clientTag.name: Client Tag
clientTag.desc: Client Tag. return emtpy string if not found.

PeerIDFromAlias.description: Returns the peer ID corresponding to a given alias for the specified client.

clientTag.name: Client tag
clientTag.desc: The tag identifying the client context.

PeerAliasFromID.description: Returns the alias associated with a given peer ID for the specified client.

peerid.name: Peer ID
peerid.desc: The peer ID to look up.

clientTag.name: Client tag
clientTag.desc: The tag identifying the client context.

PeerIDAt.description: Returns the peer ID at the given index in the peer list for the specified client.

index.name: Index
index.desc: The index in the peer list.

clientTag.name: Client tag
clientTag.desc: The tag identifying the client context.

PeerAliasAt.description: Returns the alias at the given index in the peer list for the specified client.

index.name: Index
index.desc: The index in the peer list.

clientTag.name: Client tag
clientTag.desc: The tag identifying the client context.
